name: teams_delete-discussion-comment-in-org
description:
Deletes a comment on a team discussion. OAuth access tokens require the `write:discussion` [scope](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

**Note:** You can also specify a team by `org_id` and `team_id` using the route `DELETE /organizations/{org_id}/team/{team_id}/discussions/{discussion_number}/comments/{comment_number}`.

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

team_slug.description: The slug of the team name.

discussion_number.description: The number that identifies the discussion.

comment_number.description: The number that identifies the comment.
